title: RAF Museum
description: A digital overhaul for a national museum, focusing on accessible, component-driven engineering. By implementing a mobile-first, SEO-optimized architecture, the platform delivered a 124% increase in conversions and significantly improved engagement across high-traffic visitor pages.

title: Xbox Interactive Studios
description: An award-winning retail platform for the Xbox ecosystem, serving millions of users across 20 countries. I helped engineer its high-performance storefront architecture, integrating live-streaming and Azure AI to support 17 languages and 40+ global retailers.

title: Football Foundation
description: A user-centric transformation for the UK's largest sports charity, driving a 500% increase in grant applications through an accessible, high-performance architecture.

title: Premier League Stadium Fund
description: A specialized digital platform engineered to streamline funding for stadium safety and infrastructure through an accessible, high-performance experience for UK football clubs.

title: Garolla
description: A high-conversion digital transformation leveraging a headless architecture to modernize the customer journey and maximize lead generation for the UK’s leading roller door manufacturer.

title: Partners for Purpose
description: A mission-driven digital platform focused on high accessibility and seamless content delivery to bridge the gap between businesses and charitable organizations.

title: Innovation Hub
description: A scalable digital platform for UKRI designed to showcase national innovation through an accessible, high-performance architecture.

title: Innovate No Limits
description: A dynamic digital platform designed to promote diverse career pathways in research and innovation, engineered with a focus on high accessibility and engaging, component-based storytelling.

title: Techex
description: A high-performance digital presence for a leader in video over IP technology, engineered to showcase complex broadcast solutions through a clean, modern, and SEO-optimized architecture.

title: UPower Dashboard
description: An enterprise-grade energy management dashboard engineered to provide real-time monitoring and intelligent control of solar arrays and battery storage systems.

title: U Energy Solar
description: A high-performance commercial website for a leading renewable energy provider, engineered to showcase large-scale solar solutions and drive lead generation through a clean, conversion-focused frontend.

title: OkCredit
description: A high-scale digital ecosystem for a leading fintech platform, engineered to digitize bookkeeping and streamline credit management for millions of small businesses.

title: OkCredit Blog
description: A custom-built, high-performance publishing platform for OkCredit, utilizing Ghost CMS to deliver a seamless, SEO-optimized content experience for one of India's largest fintech communities.

title: Nykaa Fashion
description: A high-traffic interactive marketing module for India’s leading beauty retailer, engineered to drive user engagement and conversion through gamified reward systems during peak sale events.

title: AFK by Decathlon
description: A gamified fitness platform for Decathlon that incentivized physical activity through a 'move-to-earn' ecosystem, integrating wearable data to reward users for active lifestyles.

title: Easy Listy
description: A lightweight cross-platform utility application built with PhoneGap and jQuery, designed to provide a seamless, local-first experience for managing tasks and real-time notifications.
